ArticleTitle.sentence: [Regulation of transcription of the interleukin-2 gene in B-lymphocytes]

event.clue: [Regulation of transcription of the interleukin-2 gene in B-lymphocytes]
[Regulation of transcription of the interleukin-2 gene in B-lymphocytes]

AbstractText.sentence: Since most B cell clones immortalized with EBV virus can be induced to produce interleukin-2, a typical T cell cytokine, we studied the role of different elements of the IL-2 promoter in such clones by transfection.

event.clue: Since most B cell clones immortalized with EBV virus can be induced to produce interleukin-2, a typical T cell cytokine, we studied the role of different elements of the IL-2 promoter in such clones by transfection.

Since most B cell clones immortalized with EBV virus can be induced to produce interleukin-2, a typical T cell cytokine, we studied the role of different elements of the IL-2 promoter in such clones by transfection.

Since most B cell clones immortalized with EBV virus can be induced to produce interleukin-2, a typical T cell cytokine, we studied the role of different elements of the IL-2 promoter in such clones by transfection.

Since most B cell clones immortalized with EBV virus can be induced to produce interleukin-2, a typical T cell cytokine, we studied the role of different elements of the IL-2 promoter in such clones by transfection.

AbstractText.sentence: It was found, in particular, that the element TCEd, which binds the transcription factor NF-kB, is very active in all three B clones tested.

event.clue: It was found, in particular, that the element TCEd, which binds the transcription factor NF-kB, is very active in all three B clones tested.

AbstractText.sentence: This element has no activity in T cells of the Jurkat line.
The NFATd element, which binds the transcription factor NFAT-1 and is very active in T cells, is only weakly active in one B clone and not at all in another.

event.clue: The NFATd element, which binds the transcription factor NFAT-1 and is very active in T cells, is only weakly active in one B clone and not at all in another.

AbstractText.sentence: Different elements thus contribute to IL-2 promoter activity in different cells.

event.clue: Different elements thus contribute to IL-2 promoter activity in different cells.
